name: Detective BamUrdead And The Case Of The Dead Dude
name_original: Detective BamUrdead And The Case Of The Dead Dude
description:
You Play As Detective BamUdead, The "Greatest" Detective Who Ever Lived As He Solves A Murder! On A Floating Island!

This Game Features:

-Absurd Plot

-Strange Characters

-Voice Acting!(Sorta)

-A Loose Sense Of Logic

-Turtles!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Music By Kevin Macleod
